mapper.insert: insert into TM(tseq, title, ttype, id) values ((SELECT ifnull(max(tseq), 0) + 1 FROM TM a),#{title },#{ttype}, #{id})
insert into TM_HAVE_INFO(thiseq,tseq,iseq) values ((SELECT ifnull(max(thiseq), 0) + 1 FROM TM_HAVE_INFO a),(SELECT ifnull(max(tseq), 0) + 0 FROM TM b), #{iseq})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TM WHERE ID=#{id} ORDER BY tseq DESC
SELECT tseq FROM TM WHERE ID=#{id} ORDER BY TSEQ DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM TM WHERE ID=#{id} AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY TSEQ DESC
SELECT * FROM TM_COMMENT WHERE TTYPE=#{ttype} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TM_VISUAL_INFO(tviseq,tseq,positive,negative,neutral) VALUES ((SELECT ifnull(max(tviseq), 0) + 1 FROM TM_VISUAL_INFO a),#{tseq},#{positive},#{negative},#{neutral})
